title: My account has been logged in from somewhere else what should i do?
body: Please help me my account is being logged in from another place and IDK what to do ?

replies.body: If you think your account is being accessed by another user, check out the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to help secure your account.  Steps here will include changing your password and updating your information.  Hope it helps, but let me know if you run into any problems!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lAg9QjMO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-07T00:53:18.356+0000)
>
> If you think your account is being accessed by another user, check out the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to help secure your account.  Steps here will include changing your password and updating your information.  Hope it helps, but let me know if you run into any problems!


Thanks for replying Porocles, its been 5 days now since I sent a support ticket to riot regarding an unauthorised access to my account and still haven't got any reply back. I would be grateful if you could update me on the status of my ticket number which is #24528516. Thank you!

Thanks for the update!  Looking into this for you, it looks like the account team is waiting for an account recovery form to be filled out.  You'll want to do this by logging out of your support account and going directly to the [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  You can also do that via Incognito mode to make sure you're signed off.  We'll respond back as soon as we can!
